snippet: Concerns that Russia has a longstanding contract to deliver a sophisticated air defense system to Syria has prompted talks between Benjamin Netanyahu and Vladimir Putin in Moscow.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin will meet with Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu to discuss Russia’s sale of sophisticated air defense system to Syria.
lead_paragraph: Concerns that Russia has a longstanding contract to deliver a sophisticated air defense system to Syria has prompted talks between Benjamin Netanyahu and Vladimir Putin in Moscow.

headline.seo: Israel and Russia to Discuss Arms Sale to Syria
headline.main: Netanyahu and Putin to Discuss Syria
headline.print_headline: Netanyahu and Putin to Discuss Syria
